version_description: fixed minor bug

* Optimised for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus
* Fixed some bugs
- Support iOS 9 and fix purchase issue on iOS 9
- Support iOS 9 and fix purchase issue on iOS 9
- Support iOS 9 and fix purchase issue on iOS 9

Big Update:
This is a complete update to enhance your photo text artwork:
-High resolution-Text Art-Sticker-Font-Pattern-

-Now support high resolution photo save
-More stylish Handwriting and Cursive Fonts
-Finely-designed Text Combination Art
-More chic and cute stickers to choose from
-Add colors and beautiful patterns to text and sticker
-Brand-new User Interface design and easy operation
Come join us to create your artwork!

This version improved the operations and fixed problems in the last version.

- New way to choose album, easier to use.
- New way to crop photos, more convenient and more ratios to choose from
- Add a new set of "Mother's Day" TextArt. Enjoy it!

Let's make the art creation easier and better!
Fix minor bugs.

— Adjust letter space and line space to make your words stylish and cool
— Add light filter effects, helping you make fantasized photo effects
— Add texture filter effects, photos becoming special and unique
— New sticker packs “Father’s Day”, “Birthday”, “Party” to bring you more fun!
— New sticker mirror function added

Let's make the art creation easier and better!
If you like Photo on Texts, please rate us on App Store. We will keep improving it.
Fixed the problem that might cause crash on save page.

- Add Erase function in this version! You can hide parts of the words or stickers to make special photo text.
- More cursive and vintage Fonts added.
- New gradient colors could be used on Texts, TextArts and Stickers. Amazing effects!
- Optimized User Experience.

Let's make the art creation easier and better!
If you like Texts on Pictures, please rate us on App Store. We will keep improving it.
Fixed a problem that might cause the app crash.

- Outstanding artworks will be recommended on our Inspiration page. More people will appreciate your artwork and follow you!

- Autumn stickers added. Use them to decorate your photo art with stunning effects!

- Add entrances in Push Notification widgets and 3D Touch shortcuts. More convenient to start your creation.

- Optimized User Experience Details.

Start building your Photo Text Art world. If you like Text on Pictures, please rate us on App Store. We will keep improving it and offer more goodies.
Fixed the problem that might cause crash. Overall optimization.
Improved user experiences

Important new features:
- Typography styles add. Enter your words, the app will automatically transform them into beautiful typography designs! Creative and Artful!
- Add more Christmas and New Year stickers, bright textures. Amazing effects!

Start building your Photo Text Art world. If you like Text on Pictures, please rate us on App Store. We will keep improving it and offer more goodies.

- Newly added 10 typography styles templates, automatically turn your photo text into a piece of artwork!
- Add sticker packs of Speech Bubbles, Facial Deco and Baby stickers. Popular and hot!

Start building your Photo Text Art world. If you like Text on Pictures, please rate us on App Store. We will keep improving it and offer more goodies.
Fixed a minor problem.

Start creating your own art world with us!

We will continue to make every effort in improving this App to provide the best user experience and sincerely appreciate your continuous support on us!

We’d like to hear from you! Leave a review on the App Store to let us know your thoughts. Thanks!

Warm Regards,
@ PicSee

- Now you can have color background for typography styles, not only photo background
- Added new camera entrance with 100+ professional filters
- Improved homepage design, easier to use

What’s new on PicSee:
- Support iOS 12 and iPhone X
- Bug fixed & Performance improvement

We are hearing from you and we gave our best to bring you a better Picsee. Thanks for your feedbacks!

Better Picsee versions are on their way, so stay tuned : )

What’s new on PicSee:
- Support iOS 12 and iPhone X
- Bug fixed & Performance improvement

New updates are full of "things you cannot see, but we promise you they're there!" bug fixes and performance improvements.

Thank you for using Picsee! We are always striving to improve our app, release regular updates, and make sure we have fresh designs available every time.

Picsee makes design simple and fun. Amazing designs for work, life, and entertainment —no special skill needed
Even your favorite TV series had filler episodes - guess the same goes for apps. Nothing too mind-blowing in this update, just small bug fixes and performance improvement.

Hey guys! All good on your side? We are doing great as well, thanks!
Minor bug fixing and performance improvements, as they call it. Take care!
